articles.title: Video: Europe's Biggest Steel Works "Destroyed" In Ukraine War - NDTV
articles.description: One of Europe's biggest iron and steel works, Azovstal, has been badly damaged as Russian forces lay siege to the Ukrainian port city of Mariupol, officials said Sunday.
articles.content:
One of Europe's biggest iron and steel works, Azovstal, has been badly damaged.

articles.title: Russia to work on solo Mars mission after Europe freezes joint project - Interfax - CNA
articles.description: Russia will start work on its own Mars mission given that the European Space Agency (ESA) has suspended a joint project in the wake of the Ukraine invasion, Interfax news agency quoted a top official as saying on Friday.The ESA announced on Thursday that it w…

articles.title: Here's Who Needs a Fourth COVID Vaccine and When to Get It - msnNOW
articles.description: If you've already received two doses of a Moderna or Pfizer COVID vaccine, plus a booster, you may be wondering if you'll need to get a fourth shot - especially in light of the recent news of rising case counts in Europe.
